text: Izaura TV is a television channel operated by a TV2 Group that broadcasts in Hungary. It is a telenovella channel, and it was launched on 14 August 2016 at 20:00 CET. ==Shows== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Original Title !! Original Country !! Year of production !!
